text:
Research Software Developer | Dataware Ventures | Remote | Full Time

We're a startup that's building a technology called field specialization, which greatly improves the performance of DBMSs and other data-intensive apps with minimal changes to their code.

We seek a full time research software developer to help us realize our dreams and keep pace with customer demand.

Technologies: C/C++, static/dynamic analysis, DBMS internals

Must be able to legally work in US or Canada.

Full job description: http://www.datawareventures.com/#!careers/cc1r

Apply: jobs@datawareventures.com
